Branding Strategy

Zoopon branding

Zoopon branding concept design by red halozen. It’s a new adaptation in our branding service fresh ideas and fresh designs. Zoopon is a virtual bank. Here is privacy is the first priority every user can trade their money anonymously. We don’t collect any data from our users. Everything between us and our users is transference. We don’t share our data with the government and any third-party app. Because user privacy is the first priority in our work. Working on the project I got an idea let’s make a fictional bank where user privacy is the first priority. Here users can transfer money, buy bonds, credit cards, saving their assets without sharing their data with the government any third-party app or company. The future is privacy. It became an asset for social media or e-commerce companies. So why do you want to become a product. In this project, I tried my best to highlight my idea on privacy & policy and what a bank can do to secure user data and privacy.

Thanks for enrolling my page. If you like my works you can hire me on Fiverr. Also follow me on instrahram.
— I build designs systems for companies

Site of the Day
Honorable Mention

We provide digital experience services to startups and small businesses. We help our clients succeed by creating brand identities, digital experiences, and print materials. Install any demo, plugin or template in a matter of seconds. Just select the demo and click OK. It’s that easy! The latest design trends meet hand-crafted templates in Ave Collection.
